participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake enjoys trying new experiences and meeting new people. He often seeks social interactions, especially at the gym.
participant_1.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i watch too much tv in spare time. i have never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Curious and imaginative, Emily loves to explore the world through games and often shares her vibrant thoughts with others.
participant_2.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox. i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i hate school. i do not have many friends.
